reviewText: Some of the discs had slight glitches.  Otherwise, quality of filming and audio is good.
This drama is absolutely superb, with accurate portrayals and technically correct scenes

i first saw this Korean drama when i was visiting my relatives in Manila, and i really enjoyed it
this is a story of music students struggle to be members of the school orchestra and of two
gifted musician who is searching and finding inspiration and support from one another
excellent cast from top to bottom and very good and entertaining music.

I thought when I buy this from Amazon it would be a good quality it was not and it was so many advertising at the bottom that I couldn't even read the subtitles I went with Amazon thinking I would get in top quality product and I feel like I got a bootleg DVD
Excellent rom-com. The leads are a perfect match.

I really love K-dramas and this is no exception.  The story of musicians who are called the leftovers and their eventual success through tenacity and hard work.  It is a little silly but has beautiful classical music and endearing characters
